Package net.ligreto.data

The data provider and data manipulation classes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AggregationResult Holds the aggregated comparison result across multiple rows and columns.
ColumnAggregationResult Holds the aggregated comparison result for one column across multiple rows.
DataProvider This is the class defining the interface to various data providers.
DataProviderRow This is the row of the data provider.
Field This class is used to copy the column values from the database result set and store them for later usage.
ResultSetDataProvider The data provider class encapsulating the ResultSet object into DataProvider.
Row Encapsulates the array of Column objects.
SortingDataProvider Data provider which sorts the data obtained from the underlying data provider by the values of key columns.
SqlExecutionThread The class allowing to execute the SQL statement in the separate execution thread.
 

Package net.ligreto.data Description

The data provider and data manipulation classes.
